message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more than my initial asking price.  However, to show my commitment to our potential partnership, I'm willing to offer it at $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, as I have other interested parties.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $950,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but the value of this product to you is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000.  This is my final offer, as I do have John prepared to pay the full asking price.

I understand your position, Alice, but $925,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me and my budget.
